summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2489 for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue Northeast, between East Forty-fifth Street and East Fifty-fourth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Majority Petition File No. 43899, under Ordinance No. 27286, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
